feed.title: Colorado Activist Feed
feed.subtitle: Aggregation of Colorado activist posts from across social media.

entry.title: Bridge encountered an unexpected situation! (18851)
entry.content:
Facebook Bridge | Main Site was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Call to a member function children() on null`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Facebook&context=User&u=DenverJusticeProject&media_type=all&limit=-1&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

teromene, logmanoriginal

entry.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18851)
entry.content:
Twitter @DenJustPro was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=DenJustPro&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

entry.title: Hey AWTN Family, We have 2 more spots available for Summer...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

Hey AWTN Family, We have 2 more spots available for Summer Lunches. If you would like to volunteer or donate PLEASE sign up https://mealtrain.com/0484y9
#AWTN#SUMMERTIME#LUNCHES

entry.title: AWTN wants to give a special Thank you to All Saints Lutheran...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

AWTN wants to give a special Thank you to All Saints Lutheran for donating and helping with Summer Lunches#AWTN#SUMMERTIME

entry.title: We are closed this week after a positive COVID test with one of...

entry.title: Now more than ever the need to help our homeless population on...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

Now more than ever the need to help our homeless population on East Colfax is mounting. With the affects of COVID-19 only just beginning and the number of people we see on the streets growing, we must act now.

Funds to provide food, shelter and clothing for our East Colfax Community

flipcause.com

Its cold Be part of our homeless outreach

Funds to provide food, shelter and clothing for our East Colfax CommunityFunds to provide food, shelter and clothing for our East Colfax CommunityDonate

entry.title: We are beginning to take sign ups for our winter outreach meals...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are beginning to take sign ups for our winter outreach meals again. Please share with your community so we can be sure to have meals for those folks who are living on the streets & in our local motels.

Meals Needed!

mealtrain.com

Meal Train Update for Aurora Warms the Night

Meals Needed!Meals Needed!

entry.title: There's a blanket drive going on for AWTN. Please...
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

There's a blanket drive going on for AWTN. Please contribute if you can! https://fb.watch/263MXk_tzL/

Cain Home Partners at Keller Williams Executives Realty

Drop off your blanket donations any Saturday in November or December in the Parking Lot of The Church Of Jesus Christ Latter Day Saints located at 3101 S. Flanders St Aurora Co 80013. Hope to see you there!

Our clothing store is up!

The East Colfax t-shirts and hats are a tribute to our East Colfax neighborhood - 100% of the profits go to Aurora Warms the Night
https://www.bonfire.com/store/awtn/

entry.title: Order your t-shirt today! #homeless #eastcolfax #auroracolorado
entry.content:
Aurora Warms the Night

Order your t-shirt today!
#homeless #eastcolfax #auroracolorado

Each purchase buys a weeks worth of food for an individual. 100% of the profits go towards combatting homelessness along the East Colfax corridor in Denver/ Aurora Colorado
